name: GamiPress – Activity by Category
author: GamiPress

sections.description:
GamiPress – Activity by Category let’s you add activity events filtered by post category adding new activity events on GamiPress!

New Events

  • Publish a post on a specific category: When an user publish a post on a specific category.
  • Comment on a post of a specific category: When an user comments on a post of a specific category.
  • Daily visit a post of a specific category: When an user daily visits a post of a specific category.
  • Get visits on any post of a specific category: When a content author gets visits on a post of a specific category.
sections.installation:
From WordPress backend

  1. Navigate to Plugins -> Add new.
  2. Click the button “Upload Plugin” next to “Add plugins” title.
  3. Upload the downloaded zip file and activate it.

Direct upload

  1. Upload the downloaded zip file into your wp-content/plugins/ folder.
  2. Unzip the uploaded zip file.
  3. Navigate to Plugins menu on your WordPress admin area.
  4. Activate this plugin.
